Trade/Device Name(s): Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay Carboxy-THC (THCA)
Hair Drug Screening Assay for THCA
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay Carboxy-THC (THCA) using ELISA for preliminary detection of cannabinoids in hair specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for qualitative detection of cannabinoids (THCA) in human head and body hair samples; preliminary analytical results require confirmation with GC/MS or GC/MS/MS.
